Key Match Events: Roland Sallai scored the opening goal for Hungary on 32 minutes
Denzel Dumfries equalized for the Netherlands with a header in the 83rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Denzel Dumfries praised his team's resilience in the match
Virgil van Dijk expressed regret over his red card
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary ended a run of nine straight defeats against the Netherlands
The match was played at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary
Others: The Netherlands finished the game with 10 men after Virgil van Dijk was sent off
The game ended in a 1-1 draw
